programme.title: Should I Stay or Should I Go?
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers Europe’s reliance on the UN for dealing with Saddam Hussein.
programme.medium_synopsis: Whilst the warship, Monitor, is dredged out of the Atlantic Ocean, Alistair Cooke reflects that Europe’s reliance on the UN for sanctions against Saddam Hussein is an 'easy cop out'.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Should I Stay or Should I Go?

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
